1556420.name: Wide Open
1556420.description:
'Wide Open' was born out of a love for old-school, top-down offroad racing games. Offroad racing has come a long way since the days of the 8 bit and 16 bit systems and this game intends to reflect those evolutions. With a fully deformable terrain, you can be sure that no lap will be like the last. You can enjoy timing big jumps and drifting corners. There are many terrain types like asphalt, dirt, sand, mud, and more! Numerous tracks are available and more will be on their way.

Features

Over 64 tracks!
Each track is unique in that they all have different soil types and can range from large, fast tracks to tight stadium tracks.

Real time terrain deformation
Each track features unique soil types that deform under the wheels of each vehicle. The terrain changes rapidly so no two laps are the same. Soil types include mud, loam, sand, hard-packed clay, and many others.

Multiple vehicles
Currently, there are six vehicles to choose from, each with different handling characteristics so you can choose the vehicle that suits you the best.

Replay system
With our new replay system, you can relive your best finishes and your worst crashes. There are four camera modes available so you can get the angle you are looking for.

Camera modes
The game features a fully adjustable orbital, top-down camera as well as a follow camera for those who want to use it.

Single Player

Race modes
Choose between 3 different race modes - Race, Time-trial, and Freeride.

Fully customizable race properties
Choose the number of laps as well as other AI racers.

Race Series
Play your way through 8 race series to unlock more tracks and achievements.

Multiplayer (Beta)

Official Game Servers
Play on the official game servers for the best multiplayer experience. Official servers have a checkmark next to them in the server browser.

Host a server
Host your own server with your own rules through the multiplayer menu.

Race Modes
All race modes in single-player are available in multiplayer.

Tracks
All 64+ tracks are available to play on
